file_insights.changes_summary: Added test_ai_assistant method and CLI interface with argparse
key_additions: test_ai_assistant method for manual AI assistant testing with query and assistant parameters
main function with argparse CLI for command-line execution
Detailed docstring with instructions and evaluation criteria output

patterns_discovered.description: Added argparse-based command-line interface wrapping existing class methods
patterns_discovered.significance: Enables standalone script execution for manual testing workflows

patterns_discovered.description: Method logs via self.logger and provides formatted console output for manual testing instructions
patterns_discovered.significance: Maintains consistency with existing logging infrastructure while providing clear user-facing guidance

patterns_discovered.description: test_ai_assistant delegates to existing generate_test_instructions method
patterns_discovered.significance: Reuses existing logic while adding a higher-level interface for manual testing

gotchas_discovered.description: Assistant choices are hard-coded as ['chatgpt', 'claude', 'perplexity', 'gemini', 'copilot'] in argparse
gotchas_discovered.impact: Future additions of new AI assistants require updating the CLI argument parser, not just the method logic
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Could centralize choices in a constant for easier maintenance

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No return value utilization from main()
gotchas_discovered.description: test_ai_assistant returns a dictionary, but the main() function doesn't capture or use the return value
gotchas_discovered.impact: Return data is lost after execution; useful for potential future programmatic usage or logging
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider storing results or providing JSON output option

approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Extended existing AEOTestingWorkflow class with a new public method and standalone CLI interface
key_accomplishments: Created test_ai_assistant method that wraps generate_test_instructions
Implemented formatted console output for testing instructions and evaluation criteria
Added argparse-based CLI with required query parameter and optional assistant selection
Maintained consistency with existing logging and method patterns
approach_outcome.completeness: Feature appears complete with proper documentation, error handling via logging, and user-friendly CLI interface

recommendations.details: Extract assistant choices into a class constant or module-level constant to avoid duplication between method logic and argparse configuration

recommendations.suggestion: Add JSON output option to CLI
recommendations.details: Add --json flag to main() to optionally output test results as JSON, enabling programmatic usage and integration with other tools

recommendations.suggestion: Capture and log return value in main()
recommendations.details: Store the returned instructions_data for potential logging to file or further processing, making the return value useful

recommendations.suggestion: Add usage examples in module docstring
recommendations.details: Include example command-line invocations in the module docstring for easier reference
